mapper.insert: insert into publisher (pnum, publisher, userid) values (seq_publisher.nextval, #{publisher}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select publisher from publisher where upper(publisher) like upper(#{input})||'%' order by publisher
mapper.delete: delete from game_publisher where gnum = #{gnum} and pnum = (select pnum from publisher where publisher=#{publisher})
mapper.select: select pnum, publisher from ( select pnum, publisher from publisher where UPPER(publisher) like '%' || UPPER(#{gameKeyword}) || '%' order by CASE WHEN UPPER(publisher) like UPPER(#{gameKeyword}) || '%' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) where rownum between 1 and 12
